meanings.sent1: The unwoven fabric felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She admired the unwoven threads hanging loosely from the loom.
meanings.sent3: The unwoven blanket looked like a pile of tangled yarn.
meanings.sent4: His unwoven story lacked the intricate details of a well-crafted tale.
meanings.sent5: The unwoven basket unraveled in the rain, revealing its true nature.

meanings.sent1: The unwoven basket was made of twisted branches.
meanings.sent2: They marveled at the unwoven design of the ancient tapestry.
meanings.sent3: The unwoven sweater resembled a patchwork of mismatched colors.
meanings.sent4: Her unwoven hair cascaded down her back in wild waves.
meanings.sent5: The unwoven rope frayed at the edges, showing its raw material.

meanings.definition: Not put together in a woven pattern
meanings.sent1: The unwoven rug lay in a heap on the floor.
meanings.sent2: He struggled to mend the unwoven sections of the torn fabric.
meanings.sent3: The unwoven web of lies he spun eventually unraveled.
meanings.sent4: Her unwoven thoughts wandered aimlessly through her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unwoven tapestry of memories faded with time, leaving only fragments.
